title: Preserve suspension-point frame lifetimes and task-context ABI edges in coroutine lowering

mode_matrix.name: debug-o0
abi_requirements: locals used after await are carried in coroutine frame storage across suspension
defer cleanup remains attached to coroutine completion and unwind paths after suspension
task-context handoff across suspend and resume edges follows async ABI lowering contract

mode_matrix.name: optimized-o2
abi_requirements: optimization preserves frame-carried lifetimes required for values that cross await
optimization preserves defer cleanup reachability on coroutine completion and unwind exits
optimization does not alter task-context ABI shape across suspend and resume boundaries

abi_field_stability.stability_property: values that cross await suspension remain in stable coroutine frame storage
suspend and resume edges preserve task-context ABI metadata needed by importers
